html: My thoughts are with the families of #SantaFe who were supposed to be looking forward to summer break with their loved ones. Please reach out to @everytown to see what you can do to help be a part of this movement that needs to get even louder.
text: My thoughts are with the families of #SantaFe who were supposed to be looking forward to summer break with their loved ones. Please reach out to @everytown to see what you can do to help be a part of this movement that needs to get even louder.

html: I am at a complete loss for words watching yet another school shooting. This time in my home state of Texas. Congress continues to do absolutely nothing and it’s infuriating.
text: I am at a complete loss for words watching yet another school shooting. This time in my home state of Texas.  Congress continues to do absolutely nothing and it’s infuriating.
